intro: <0>Scanners<1>Scanners are Genshin tools that can automatically scan game data from screenshots or directly from the game.<2>Below are several scanners that have been tested with GO.<3>To upload the exported file, go to the <1>Settings page and upload your file in the Database Upload section.
tosWarn: As any tools that indirectly interact with the game, although their usage is virtually undetectable, <1>there could still be risk with using them.</1> User discretion is advised.
tosStrongWarn: Packet capture/network scanners, <1>may have a risk with using them.</1> User discretion is advised.
addlArtiText: Supports scanning unactivated substats, and roll counts when possible

nb.title: Artiscan
nb.p1: This web-based OCR scanner can capture your game window, scan from a screenshot, or scan from a video. The screenshot/video capture can be fullscreen and does not need to be cropped.
nb.p2: Mobile/PlayStation can only be scanned from screenshots or video.
nb.p3: This scanner relies on user input to switch between artifacts.

ik.title: Inventory Kamera
ik.p1: OCR scans all characters, weapons, artifacts and materials in your inventory.

is.title: Irminsul
is.p1: Sniffs network packets to scan all characters, weapons, artifacts and materials in your inventory.

as.title: AdeptiScanner
as.p1: OCR scans all artifacts and weapons in your inventory. Has a manual scanning mode and can also import character data from <1>Enka.Network</1>.

goodeng: This app only scans in English and exports to <1>GOOD</1> format.
seelieme: This app can also scan materials for <1>Seelie.me</1>
